translation.en: I know what happens when you die?

translation.ko: 눈에 띄지 않고 다른 유령에게만 보인다

translation.en: unable to return to those you loved.
Ghosts have one power above all others...

translation.ko: 죗값을 치르게 하는 것 "수백 명을 죽인 독재자"

translation.en: This is the day I died, three years ago...
as far as anyone else knows.
There was no eulogy. No wake.
But this isn't where the story really starts. No, no.
translation.ko: 하지만 진짜 이야기의 시작은 여기가 아니라

translation.en: That was four months ago, on my team's first mission.
And that was a glorious clusterfuck.
-They're for your own safety. -Get in the car.
translation.ko: 안전을 위한 거야 차에 타 피 흘리고 있어

translation.en: -We're gonna need a hospital. -Getting a little tense in here.
translation.ko: 병원에 가야 돼 급한 거 안 보여?

translation.en: Where did the guys come from?
-You said you were covering the door. -I was covering the door.
-You were shot through a window. -Such an amateur show.
I know, you got shot through the window. God, that's so bad.
translation.ko: 그놈들이 창문으로 쐈다니까! - 제대로 맞았네 - 무슨 놈의

translation.en: -What lawyer has this many guards? -You're definitely gonna die.
translation.ko: - 변호사가 경호원을 몰고 다녀? - 살긴 글렀네

translation.en: I don't know, a lawyer with friends in high places.
The point is we got this. That's all that matters.
I'm gonna go in there really deep and find that bullet.
translation.ko: 아주 깊이 넣어서 총알 찾을 거야

translation.en: No, no. Don't. No, you're not gonna put that in her.
-Oh, I'm gonna yak. -We got a tail.
Stop playing with your fucking gun, and let me work.
Hey, I think they got us. You wanna...
Yeah, here we go. Hang on.
What did you guys do in there? Why are you covered in blood?
translation.ko: 뭔 짓을 하고 온 거야? 왜 피를 뒤집어썼어?

translation.en: The head, neck, and face are very vascular, so it's a lot of blood.
translation.ko: 머리, 목, 얼굴엔 혈관이 많아 그래서 피도 많지

translation.en: Oh, please tell me you didn't kill a mafia guy in Italy.
No. I'm trying to help you here.
Anything beyond a simple "yes" is gonna just super suck for your face.
translation.ko: 멀쩡한 얼굴로 살려면 협조하는 게 좋아

translation.en: Look, your client is a half-wit, fuckstain war criminal.
translation.ko: 댁의 의뢰인은 정신 나간 또라이 전범이잖아

translation.en: My client has never ordered any gas attacks.
translation.ko: 그분은 가스 공격을 지시한 적 없어

translation.en: No, he's ordered the four generals that work for him
Just get him on the phone.
Let's just fucking get nuts. What do you say?
-She's getting blood on my car. -Shut up for one second!
Hey, can I just take a moment to thank you?
There is nothing else I'd rather be doing with my life.
Oh, I so had the right of way.
You hit one more person, and I'm walking.
translation.ko: 한 명만 더 치면 걸어갈 거야

translation.en: -You hear that? -A lot of backseat driving going on.
translation.ko: 한 명만 더 치면 걸어갈 거야 입운전은 잘해요

translation.en: Nice call on the Day-Glo green.
Just blends right into the Italian architecture.
-What, you don't like this color? -Baby, baby, baby!
-She's lost a shit ton of blood. -This isn't a shit ton.
I'm judge of what's a shit ton. You see? Blood. Red.
translation.ko: 그건 내가 판단해 봤지? 피, 빨간색

translation.en: Can you just staunch it or whatever the fuck you call it?
translation.ko: 그 지혈인지 뭔지 하면 안 돼?

translation.en: I can actually hear it pumping out.
-That was literally... She squirted. -It's a lot of blood.
translation.ko: - 뿜었어! - 젠장! - 피바다야 - 입엔 안 들어갔다고 해줘

translation.en: Tell me that didn't go in your mouth.
Guess this happens when you try to steal a whole country. Right, One?
translation.ko: 국보라도 훔쳤나 보네 안 그래, 원?

translation.en: We probably could have used a warm-up mission.
Yeah, that's my problem. I'm just getting warmed up.
translation.ko: 난 그게 문제야 몸이 풀리고 있어

translation.en: Why is everyone on a fucking Vespa?
Remind me, where the fuck is "here"?
Top of the Duomo, like we talked about.
Coming north, down Via de... Via de...
Come back. I've got an idea.
Who knew the optic nerve was so long?
Surprised his asshole didn't come with it.
This isn't gonna work. Pull over there.
translation.ko: 흔들려서 안 되겠어 잠깐 좀 세워봐

translation.en: No. What the fuck? What the fuck, dude?
Don't you squish it, you motherfucker!
-You squish it, the mission's over! -Get it!
-Toss it! -Keep your goddamn eye on the road!
-Did you just, like, scoop it out, or-- -God, no. I didn't scoop it out.
translation.ko: 당신이 파낸 거야? 미쳤어? 내가 안 했어

translation.en: It's gonna lead us straight to the four generals.
-I'm getting light-headed. -You're not the one holding it.
translation.ko: 나 약간 어지러워 들고 있는 건 나야

translation.en: You got the generals? Can I go?
There's a cop looking right at us.
You gotta lose that police chopper.
Yeah, hey. Shit's gone. We're super fucked.
Well, I could probably point you to il bagno.
As soon as we get clear, lose the chopper. Can you do that?
translation.ko: 벗어나는 대로 헬기 따돌려 저 헬기 따돌릴 수 있어?

translation.en: -Lose the chopper? -Can I lose the chopper?
translation.ko: 저 헬기 따돌릴 수 있어? 헬기 따돌릴 수 있냐고?

translation.en: -Is your arm hurt? -What? You wanna fucking shoot?
Then can you use it to shoot back?
The museum next to where we got those mochaccinos.
translation.ko: 우리 모카치노 마신 가게 옆 미술관...

translation.en: I remember the mochaccinos! I'm saying, fuck, no!
Mind if I turn on some music?
Just watch out for the people!
Okay, where in the fuck is the front door?
You said whatever I need to do, right? So I'm just gonna do it.
translation.ko: 필요한 일이면 뭐든 하랬지? 지금 할 거야

translation.en: -We're definitely gonna be on the news. -No shit. Hang on.
translation.ko: - 뉴스 타게 생겼네 - 말이라고, 꽉 잡아

translation.en: No! That was Apollo and Daphne.
You see any choppers? I don't see any choppers.
Not the David. No! Not the David!
translation.ko: 다비드상은 안 돼 다비드는 안 돼!

translation.en: Is the David the one with the really small...
You wanna get out and compare, or should we maybe think about going?
Oh, shit! Two black Suburbans coming your way.
Six, fake 'em out. I'm coming to you.
You got a superhero on the squad!
I don't HAVE ANY MORE BULLETS!
-Shit's about to get crazy. -Now? I'm conducting surgery.
translation.ko: 난리 나겠는데 지금? 나 수술 중이야

translation.en: -I'm trying to lose a thousand cars. -She's gonna die, you know?
translation.ko: - 난 차 천 대 따돌리고 있어 - 이러다 죽어

translation.en: You can live for days with a gunshot wound in the stomach.
I got it. I got it!
I feel so much better now.
Yes! Now, that's driving! That's driving!
Here's a toast to a kid I liked.
We didn't even know his name.
Thought I managed the risk. I'm sorry.
I think you're looking at it. All of us.
-Barbara Billingsley, Hugh Beaumont? -Never heard of it.
translation.ko: - 바버라 빌링슬리, 휴 보몬트? - 처음 들어

translation.en: No? Nobody watches Nick at Nite?
French don't watch shit like that.
Millennials, French people. Let's just grab the head.
It means we find a Seven.
Central, Aid and Base. Aid and Base, this is Central. The net is yours.
We got a van stepping out. United Nations.
Black Hawk, you got eyes on the white van?
He's headed for my guys, and I don't like it.
I said he is headed for my guys.
Looks like the letters are backwards.
I said the UN is backwards. Request permission to fire.
translation.ko: UN 글자가 뒤집혔다 발포 허가 바란다

translation.en: Maybe you haven't heard, we're spectators here, dude.
translation.ko: 아직 모르나 본데 여기 관중이 많아

translation.en: Unless you wanna suck on a court-martial,
I suggest you pull up a chair and spectate.
you may not know me, but Johnny's one of my Delta brothers. A friend.
We've been looking for a special operator like you for a while.
translation.ko: 당신 같은 특수요원을 계속 찾고 있었어

translation.en: I'm somebody who'd have let you pull the trigger.
I listened to your call. Never mind how.
I would've let you pull that trigger.
But we can make it a little less shitty, you know?
translation.ko: 하지만 덜 더럽게 만들 순 있지

translation.en: And I'm the guy who can help you do that.
translation.ko: 그럴 수 있게 도와줄 수 있어

translation.en: Ever wonder what it would be like
if you could do the job that you were put on this Earth to do?
translation.ko: 실행할 수 있다면 어떨 것 같아?

translation.en: If you could take out some truly evil people.
translation.ko: 진정 악한 놈들을 처리할 수 있다면

translation.en: Not people that the government tells you are evil,
because based on, you know, policies or politics and bureaucracy
or trade relations or any of that shit.
No, I'm talking truly world-class evil motherfuckers.
I can help you go after those guys.
And I will never tell you to not pull that trigger.
translation.ko: 방아쇠 당기지 말란 말은 절대로 안 해

translation.en: What would you say to that?
-Hey, what's that guy doing? -Don't do it!
As a matter of fact, his family fought for us since the Second World War.
And like those before him, Blaine believed in right and wrong,
in knowing the difference and then doing something about it.
he heard as a kid about his grandfather.
A Tuskegee airman killed in action in 1944.
He would like that we're here,
And he damn sure loved his country, like Captain America.
And none of us know how we would react
translation.ko: 우리 중 누구라도 블레인과 같은 상황에선 당황했을 겁니다

translation.en: if we were put in the same position he was.
I would've shot the motherfuckers. I would've blown their fucking heads off.
That's just me. I would've been the last man standing.
translation.ko: 다 죽일 때까지 멈추지 않았을 겁니다

translation.en: And I don't have any military background, but I'm like a mother duck.
translation.ko: 전 군인은 아니지만 어미 새 같은 사람이라 내 새끼들을 건드리면...

translation.en: You get in the way of my ducklings...
translation.ko: 어미 새 같은 사람이라 내 새끼들을 건드리면...

translation.en: Man, just sit down. Just sit down.
You should have seen him watching Coco. Puddle of tears.
translation.ko: '코코' 같이 볼 때도 눈물 펑펑 쏟았지

translation.en: From now on, you'll be known as Seven. I'm One.
There's this trick that we all do to get through our day.
translation.ko: 사람이 하루를 살아내는 어떤 기술이 있지

translation.en: We take a box and into that box we place all the horrors of the world,
translation.ko: 상자를 하나 가져다가 "보코하람 테러" 온 세상 끔찍한 일들과

translation.en: all the wrongs humans do to one another.
translation.ko: 온 세상 끔찍한 일들과 인간이 서로에게 저지른 만행들을 집어넣고

translation.en: And then we close the box and pretend it doesn't exist.
Only some of us spend too much time inside the box.
translation.ko: 몇몇은 그 상자 안에 너무 오래 있어서

translation.en: We've lost our ability to pretend.
We know there's too much unfinished business
translation.ko: 너무나 더러운 세상임을 알고 있는 거지
너무나 더러운 세상임을 알고 있는 거지 "얼쩡대지 마라"

translation.en: Our job as ghosts is to do the dirty work the living can't or won't.
translation.ko: 우린 산 자들이 못 하거나 안 하는 일을 해

translation.en: And we do it from here.
It's a lot like the Batcave, except it's nothing like the Batcave.
You're gonna be restricted to cities that you've never visited before.
translation.ko: 앞으론 안 가본 도시만 갈 수 있고

translation.en: People that you've never met. All, of course, except your fellow ghosts.
translation.ko: 우리 고스트 빼곤 모르는 사람만 만나야 해

translation.en: None of whom you'll know by name, only number, for safety,
translation.ko: 서로 이름도 모르고 보안상 숫자로 불러

translation.en: and so no one gets too close.
This is our target hit board.
These nine men have been placing too much shit inside the box.
translation.ko: 이 9명은 상자 속에 똥을 잔뜩 싸질러서

translation.en: So now, they answer to us.
the dictator of Turgistan, Rovach Alimov.
When you're dead, you get to stop all the bullshit.
No more DMV lines, no more shopping Christmas...
translation.ko: 차량국에서 줄 서는 것도 크리스마스 쇼핑도

translation.en: They should make an "Out of Office" reply for dead people.
"Sorry, I'm away from the planet right now. I'm fucking dead."
No more tax, no more criminal records,
no more getting arrested by the pigs just for being naked or just...
Usual stuff, you know? Being naked, getting drunk. Casual stuff.
translation.ko: 벗고 있었다고 체포될 일도 없어 가끔 취해서 벗을 수도 있는 거잖아

translation.en: Know what the best part about being dead is?
translation.ko: 죽어서 제일 좋은 게 뭔지 알아?

translation.en: Don't look at me like that. I'm fucking American.
Fuck you, high blood pressure. I'll eat whatever the fuck I want.
translation.ko: 고혈압도 그렇지 엿 먹어, 고혈압 맘대로 처먹을 거야 감사합니다

translation.en: You realize you're actually still alive, right?
translation.ko: 진짜 죽은 거 아닌 건 알지?

translation.en: What they don't know is that I've been making magnets
translation.ko: 팀원들은 모르지만 난 중1 때부터 자석을 만들어 왔다

translation.en: since my seventh grade science fair project.
translation.ko: 난 중1 때부터 자석을 만들어 왔다

translation.en: Which I completely dominated by the way.
I soon figured out how to take big stuff like this...
I came up with neodymium, micro magnets.
Equal vibrating phones, ten million cell phones,
Priuses, Teslas, all use my ingenuity.
And someday, this will make me very, very rich.
translation.ko: 언젠가 이 기술로 완전 부자가 될 거야

translation.en: You guys, you got it all wrong, you know?
I mean, we're all gonna die. May as well do it while we're alive, right?
translation.ko: 어차피 죽을 건데 살아있을 때 죽는 게 낫지

translation.en: When you're young, you lock yourselves into all of these bad decisions.
translation.ko: 어릴 땐 모르니까 잘못된 결정을 해

translation.en: You know, marriages and mortgages, and all that kind of stuff.
From that point forward, all that matters is what you choose.
The point is that we should bring Seven behind the curtain.
You wanna hand me those over there?
Here we go. All right, a little demonstration. No technology.
This is how to stage a coup in three not-so-easy steps.
All right, you got a country, Turgistan, yeah?
These are the people, nice people, going about, doing their thing.
Then you got the four generals, cuatro cunts, very bad guys.
That's the piece-of-shit dictator. Right there at the top.
So, we're gonna hit the four generals. They're gonna lead us to the brother.
translation.ko: 장군 넷을 치면 그 동생을 찾게 되겠지

translation.en: You kill top generals, you fuck a dictator's day.
translation.ko: 장군들을 죽이면 독재자도 엿 되는 거야

translation.en: The second thing we're gonna do is free the brother.
The last thing that we're gonna do is, we're gonna say goodbye
to piece-of-shit dictator and hello to democracy-loving brother.
translation.ko: 그 쓰레기 독재자에게 작별인사하고 민주주의를 사랑하는 동생을 맞는 거지

translation.en: It all goes down in four months.
El Día de los Muertos. The Day of the Dead.
translation.ko: '엘 디아 데 로스 무에르토스' 죽은 자들의 날에

translation.en: Oh, that's it? Oh, well, that's pretty simple.

translation.ko: 투는 아니야 우린 고통스럽게 죽겠지 재밌군

translation.en: So, what else can you tell me about this guy Rovach in Turgistan?

translation.ko: 로바흐의 폭정을 피해 국경에 수만 명이 몰려...

translation.en: hundreds of thousands are fleeing Rovach's reign.
translation.ko: 로바흐의 폭정을 피해 국경에 수만 명이 몰려... "4년 전"

translation.en: Rovach's military targets these secret hospitals.
As the world sits on the sidelines--
A million people have been displaced since the conflict began.
translation.ko: 내전 후로 백만 명이 난민이 됐어요

translation.en: We have over 80,000 in this camp alone, nearly half of them children.
If you have time, I'd love to show you the hospital we just built.
We're not gonna go to the hospital.
I'm a little behind on my malaria pills, but--
Malaria's not an issue in this part of the world.
I'll be the judge of that.
Here's what we're gonna do, though. Okay, I'm gonna...
translation.ko: 그건 내가 판단할게요 이렇게 하죠 이제... 이름이 뭐랬죠?

translation.en: Oliver. Oliver here is gonna take a picture of us right there,
and then I am going to take some shots with some kids, hopefully not too sick.
translation.ko: 애들이랑도 몇 장 찍을게요 너무 아프거나

translation.en: Nothing too depressing, no amputees, that sort of stuff.
Then I'm gonna carry some, you know, water jugs around,
and then I'm gonna cut your foundation a giant check.
If I dropped one, I'd just walk around in circles.
What's that rich guy doing here?
I don't know. Photo op for social media? Showing he cares?
I should've been a soccer player. I could've gone pro.
Get out of here. We're good.
Come with us! We gotta get the masks!
Pull open the boxes. Pass them out.
Put that on. Put this on.
We're in the Louvre. In the most beautiful place in the world. Shut it off.
translation.ko: 이렇게 멋진 곳에서까지 일 얘기 꺼내지 마

translation.en: -Where did you find this? -Social media, sir.
translation.ko: 어디서 찾았지? SNS에서 찾았는데 전 세계에 퍼졌습니다

translation.en: News outlets and foreign governments greeted it with universal condemnation.
He is a war criminal that no one holds accountable.
His worst atrocities involve banned chemical weapons.
Such a fuss. It's all perfectly bloodless.
translation.ko: 호들갑 떠는군 피 한 방울 없거늘

translation.en: Who do you think shot it?
You shot it, had it shot and leaked,
Show my enemies what's in store for them and for those they love.
Thou wast provoked by thy foul mind,
which never dreamt on aught but butcheries.
Say that I slew them not.
But dead they are, and devilish slain by thee.
Why dost thou spit at me?
Would it were mortal poison, for thy sake.
Never came poison from so sweet a place.
translation.ko: 독은 아리따운 곳에서 나오지 않는 법

translation.en: Never hung poison on a fouler toad.
Thine eyes, sweet lady, have infected mine.
translation.ko: 그대의 아리따운 눈이 내 눈에 사랑을 옮겼소

translation.en: Would they were basilisks, to strike thee dead!
translation.ko: 내 눈이 바실리스크라면 그댈 쏘아보아 죽이련만

translation.en: I'll take a Negroni. Just poured.
There's that old cliché, "Does art actually imitate life?"
translation.ko: 연극 말이에요 예술은 삶의 모방이라는 진부한 말이 있죠

translation.en: 'Cause you got this tyrant who's walking the stage...
I see a man bringing order to a disordered world.
translation.ko: 내 눈엔 혼란스러운 세상을 바로 세운 자요

translation.en: Scouring its filth, polishing it till it shines.
translation.ko: 세상의 오물을 닦고 문질러 광을 낸 자

translation.en: In art, our most fervent hopes come true.
Nah, I'm with Shakespeare. Act Five's coming.
I think you both just spoiled the end.

translation.ko: - 이름도 안 물어봤군요 - 로바흐요 아뇨, 저분 얘기예요

translation.en: Do you mind? I can feel the tip.
He's no longer inside me. We're safe.
Arianna. Big guy's still staring at me, isn't he?
translation.ko: 아리아나 저 덩치 큰 친구 아직 나 노려보죠?

translation.en: We must be doing something wrong.
'Cause the chocolates have lasted the whole night right there.
Do you believe what that man said?
I just feel like the whole world's, like, on an...
Do I look like a ghost to you?
It's like, the things you say, sounds like you want to be.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 말투를 보니까 그런 것 같아서

translation.en: But what makes you think that I want to see you again?
translation.ko: 내가 미련 가질 거라고 생각하는 거예요?

translation.en: Besides, I'm moving to New York.
And now you're all caught up.
Angela Valentine said she was going to get sick in class.
-Hey, what do you know about One? -He loves Wally the dog.
translation.ko: 원에 대해 아는 거 있어? 이 개 월리를 좋아하고

translation.en: He's obsessed with this Beaver show. I think he's an orphan.
We've got a little bet on if you wanna put some money in.
It's an interesting crew you got here, bro.
How many missions you guys run? -Counting Florence? -Yeah.
Actually, no, there was this, like, mini-mission,
so maybe like one and a quarter. It was in Sicily.
I mean, if I wasn't there, probably be more than one of us dead.
translation.ko: 나 없었으면 한 명 죽은 걸로 안 끝났어

translation.en: -That's all I'm saying. -Are you fucking kidding me?
translation.ko: 한 명 죽은 걸로 안 끝났어 지금 장난해?

translation.en: You realize I just buried myself in front of my family and friends?
translation.ko: 가족과 친구들 앞에서 장례식까지 하고 왔어

translation.en: Yeah, One told me about that.
Big military funeral. Guns popping, flags.
It's pretty cool. At my funeral there was five people there,
and two of them left before the end.
It is tough watching your mom cry at your grave.
This mission, I got a good feeling.
translation.ko: - 그래 - 아무튼 이번 임무 예감이 좋아

translation.en: I got a really good feeling about this mission.
How come you can't find this guy?
translation.ko: "무라트 동생" 왜 이 사람을 못 찾아?

translation.en: I don't know. One can usually find anyone, but he just can't seem to find him.
translation.ko: 보통은 원이 찾는데 이번엔 못 찾더라

translation.en: He said Americans caught him a few years back.
Camille, I get you hate this,
but sometimes you gotta put bad guys on thrones.
translation.ko: 왕좌에 올릴 수밖에 없어 "CIA - 작전 본부"

translation.en: I was assured by your State Department--
I've come to deliver you to your brother.
You don't know my brother. Rovach is a monster.
translation.ko: 내 형을 모르나 본데 로바흐는 괴물이에요

translation.en: He'll violate every single principle your nation holds dear.
translation.ko: 당신 나라의 원칙을 모조리 더럽힐 놈이에요

translation.en: I begged the director not to do this, Murat. I begged.
He said Americans caught him a few years back and gave him to his brother.
You like him though, One, yeah?
He's definitely an asshole, but he's a likable asshole, no?
How many billionaires do you actually know?
You've heard of Elon Musk, Bill Gates... That's the... Fuck it.
Okay. Of course, you haven't heard of me before.
translation.ko: 됐어, 아무튼 내 이름은 못 들어봤을 거야

translation.en: That's how I like it. I'm a good inventor.
Created a lot of tech, tracking, and hiding digital trails of people.
translation.ko: 디지털 흔적 추적과 은폐 기술들을 만들었고

translation.en: Some I even sold to the CIA,
where I met some interesting people, did some adventurous shit.
translation.ko: 거기 친구들 만나서 모험적인 짓들도 했지

translation.en: But slowly, I cleaned house, and I had other ideas.
translation.ko: 그러다 다 정리하고 다른 생각을 했어

translation.en: Use my money to help people in bad situations.
But I realized, my billions, that's not enough.
Governments don't really help people in need.
translation.ko: 정부는 절박한 사람들을 도울 생각이 없어

translation.en: So, I said, "Fuck the government. I'm gonna do this myself."
translation.ko: 그래서 정부고 나발이고 내가 하기로 했지

translation.en: So, here we are. A little eyeball led us to these fuckhead generals.
translation.ko: 그래서 눈알도 구하고 그 장군을 쫓는 거야

translation.en: Okay, general, you're flying to Vegas.
I have a very important mission for you.
You are going to meet Viktor, the arms dealer.
Lots of consonants, so we'll make this easy.
The little fat one. He's the handler of Rovach's baby brother.
translation.ko: 저 뚱뚱한 놈이 로바흐의 동생 책임자야

translation.en: Las Vegas has more facial recognition software than any place on Earth.
Oh, I know what I'm gonna be.
I'm a grown man.I can handle my shit.
translation.ko: 나도 어른이야 내 똥은 내가 닦아

translation.en: I don't think that's how the expression goes.
Don't handle your shit, flush it down the toilet like a grown-ass man.
translation.ko: 손으로 닦지 말고 어른처럼 제대로 닦아

translation.en: You mean the red one or the blue one?
translation.ko: 빨간 거요? 파란 거요? 페라리 같은데

translation.en: -Probably a Ferrari. -You don't see gas of this quality.
translation.ko: 이 수준의 가스는 못 찾을 겁니다

translation.en: It's US Army, experimental sarin gas for testing antidotes.
translation.ko: 미군이 해독제 만든다고 사린 가스를 실험하고

translation.en: Whatever's leftover, they bury in the desert.
You got three seconds. Be specific.
No, don't think, don't think. Talk!
Ni Hai Tower, in Hong Kong penthouse.
Good work. I said, undercover, not coked-up Borg and McEnroe.
translation.ko: 내가 변장하랬지 약 빤 보리와 매켄로 하래?

translation.en: I hate this town. I really do.
No, no, it's Navratilova. She's a woman tennis player.
Your costume's stupid, too. Motorcycle dick.
translation.ko: 네 변장도 거지 같아 폭주족은 개뿔이

translation.en: I just gotta talk to somebody.
No. I don't even know what it means.
Oh, wow.A coup. A coup d’état. It's French. Napoleon.
translation.ko: 쿠데타 몰라? 프랑스어야 나폴레옹, 프랑스 역사

translation.en: You can't tear a place down until you have someone to build it back up.
translation.ko: 재건할 사람 없이는 무너뜨리면 안 돼

translation.en: That someone is Rovach's brother, Murat.
You see, the army's fucked now we killed the generals.
translation.ko: 우리가 장군들을 죽여서 군은 이미 망했어

translation.en: They will look for a new leader.
And we're gonna give them one.
"Coup."I don't even know what it means. Stupid word.
I know, Mama. How you doing?
Ma, all I know is that it's got a "stan" at the end.

translation.ko: 아무튼 스탄으로 끝나고 아시아에 있어요 아, 캔자스 옆에?

translation.en: Anyway, the man who ran it died, and...
he left behind two sons. One good and one bad.
translation.ko: 아들이 둘 있어요 착한 놈, 나쁜 놈

translation.en: And the bad one came out on top.
So, what the fuck are you looking at, Nurse Ratched?
Go hang with the fucking nuns or something.
I will fucking knock you out in front of my mother.
Anyway, the two sons fought, and the bad one came out on top,
translation.ko: 암튼 둘이 싸워서 나쁜 놈이 올라갔고

translation.en: so he locked the good one up, and--
Yeah, me either, Mama. Working for him didn't agree with me.
translation.ko: 저도요, 엄마 그 사람 밑에서 일하기 힘들었어요

translation.en: But I work for someone else now, Ma. We're doing good things.
translation.ko: 지금은 다른 사람 밑에서 일하면서 좋은 일 해요

translation.en: We're fixing what's going on in Kansas.
Good things can erase the bad ones, right, Mama?
translation.ko: 착한 일이 나쁜 일을 지워주는 거겠죠?

translation.en: No, Ma, Andres is in Bogota. It's me, Javi.
translation.ko: 아니에요, 엄마 안드레스는 보고타에 있죠 저예요, 하비

translation.en: I won't speak to Javi anymore. He's a murderer.
translation.ko: 하비랑은 말도 섞기 싫어 그놈은 살인자야

translation.en: Ma, it was only bad people, Mama.
Please, you don't have to do this.
You and your Bruce Wayne shit!
You don't know what it's like to have someone.
She doesn't even remember my name.
So, she'll never know you stopped coming.
See, you're lucky that I don't paint the inside of this car
with chunks of your fucking skull.
Jesus, who raised you, the mob?
That's none of your fucking business, Three.
We sacrificed everything to be a part of this.
translation.ko: 우린 이걸 위해 모든 걸 희생했어

translation.en: Honor it, respect it. It's all we got.
I don't usually stand on ceremony, but today,
translation.ko: 보통은 격식을 차리지 않지만 오늘은 당신들의 상관들이 미국에서

translation.en: what just befell your superiors in America,
undid over 60 years of loyal service to my family.
Those fine men won't be replaced easily.
Your combined experience is nearly that of your predecessors,
but if my generals' shoes are to be filled,
I don't know who killed my generals,
but I'd be a fool to trust the men who most stood to benefit.
translation.ko: 죽음으로 가장 득 볼 자들을 믿을 순 없지

translation.en: All right, we're gonna tiptoe through these waypoints here, under radar.
There's our backdoor to Hong Kong.
You ever plan on calling me Six?
-Hey, look, I know we don't get to ask-- -Then don't.
translation.ko: 질문은 금지인 거 알지만... 그럼 묻지 마

translation.en: -Who is he? -A rich guy who snapped. That's all I got.
translation.ko: 근데 원은 누구야? 정신 나간 부자겠지

translation.en: -Yeah, but how did you meet him? -We didn't.
He met us. In really weird ways. -Oh, yeah. -Yeah.
Very weird, like, perfect timing kind of weird.
Fuck! We ain't leaving till we find the Kalahari.
translation.ko: 썅! 대박 건지기 전엔 못 갈 줄 알아

translation.en: Grab my hand! Grab my hand!
What do you want? What do you fucking want?
What are you? Are you a fucking pig?
But more power in finding a cause.
Something so important that you're afraid to lose it,
afraid that you're gonna die some other way.
For nothing, instead of what you're fighting for.
translation.ko: 대의를 위해 죽지 못하고 헛되이 죽을까 봐

translation.en: You're making a mistake to do this. I'm a thief. I've been robbing my whole--
translation.ko: 사람 잘못 본 거야 난 그냥 도둑이고...

translation.en: -Are you afraid? -I can make you money.
-I can be useful to you. I can help you. -You're gonna die now.
translation.ko: 도움이 될 거야 넌 지금 죽어

translation.en: -I can fucking help you! -You can fucking die now.
-If you're gonna do it, fucking do it. -You die now!
translation.ko: 할 거면 그냥 해버려 - 지금 죽어! - 해버리라고!

translation.en: -Oh, my God! -You sick fuck! Who fucking does that?
translation.ko: 세상에 이 미친 새끼야! 무슨 짓이야?

translation.en: -You should have seen your face. -You sick fuck!
translation.ko: 표정 가관이었어 이 미친 새끼, 재미없어!

translation.en: I never thought I'd meet a family more screwed up than mine.
translation.ko: 우리 집 뺨치는 막장 가족을 만나게 될 줄이야

translation.en: Hey, no. Don't say that. He hates the word "family." I don't know.
We think he never had one.
And if you're ever left behind on a mission...
He's not coming back for you.
We Deltas don't operate like that.
Things gonna have to change. I promise you that.
Look, I know we're not supposed to ask, but I'm a nosy dude, so here goes.
translation.ko: 질문은 금지지만 궁금해서 안 되겠어 하나만 물어보지

translation.en: You could have fought a million battles.
Everybody talks about helping. It's nice to actually do something.
translation.ko: 다들 도움이 어쩌고 말은 잘하지만 실제로 해야 좋은 거야

translation.en: It is quite the view, little brother.
Personally, I'd prefer more gold, you know?
-You love black. -Closing on you, it's, like, dark.
In 1603, Sultan Ahmed I gave a gift to his younger siblings.
Yeah, I've learned my history, too.
Would you prefer the sultans before Ahmed?
Who strangled their younger brother with the same silk sheets?
translation.ko: 실크 천으로 동생을 목 졸라 죽인 자들?

translation.en: You have your own library, screening room.
And the occasional visit from a loving brother.
Quite generous after you tried to take what was rightfully mine.
translation.ko: 내 걸 뺏길 뻔하고도 이렇게 대우하고 있어

translation.en: The throne is not yours or mine.
Instead of a violent, ignorant, illiterate mob who just begs for the whip.
These shameful chemical attacks of yours.
You're making me more popular than yourself.
translation.ko: 형보다 내 인기만 더 올리고 있어

translation.en: The only way you'll ever leave this place
is if Daqeeq here throws you through that window.
My generals, the Four Horsemen, were just executed.
Do you know anything about that?
will only increase the frequency of my chemical strikes.
It may take years, but they will carve you up
for all the beautiful things you have done for these people.
Who? The US? They made me.
translation.ko: 누구 손에? 미국? 날 세운 놈들이야

translation.en: Did you buy that shirt by yourself?
if any harm should befall me, the same exact harm will befall you.
translation.ko: 내게 위해가 가해지면 동생에게 똑같이 하도록

translation.en: so buckle up 'cause it's about to get bumpy.
You know, I usually look at the stewardess to see if I should be scared.
translation.ko: 보통은 스튜어디스 보고 위험한 건지 판단하는데

translation.en: Flight attendant. You can look at me.
Oh, darling, you could be on fire,
and you would have the same creepy blank expression on your face. No offense.
translation.ko: 똑같이 그 소름 끼치는 무표정일 거잖아

translation.en: If we were to crash, no one would ever know or care.
translation.ko: 여기서 추락해도 아무도 모르게 죽는다는 거야

translation.en: We will have no impact on anything. Like we never existed.
translation.ko: 세상에 없던 사람들처럼 아무 영향도 없겠지

translation.en: I can hear you, and if you're gonna shit your pants,
translation.ko: 다 들리거든 바지에 지릴 거 같으면

translation.en: there's a bathroom in the back.
The world is wrapped in red tape,
and I couldn't cut through it even with a billion-dollar sword.
translation.ko: 십억 달러짜리 칼로도 끊을 수 없었다
그래서 우린 모든 걸 버리고 고스트가 됐다

translation.en: So, how long's this been going on?
I've been wondering the same thing. Florence?
So, you guys know about us?
Well, I guess it's not against the rules, right?
Depends. So, are you guys fucking or making love?
translation.ko: 상황에 따라 다르지 떡 치는 사이야, 사랑이야?
레이먼드예요 안녕, 레이먼드 우리 팀 신참이야?

translation.en: Well, we should probably go discuss our sensitive geopolitical issues
when we're, you know, Raymond free. Great security, though.
translation.ko: 레이먼드 없을 때 논의하자고 보안 끝내주네

translation.en: We're gonna break out Rovach's baby brother from his 90th-floor prison.
It's a simple snatch-and-grab. Minus the word simple because it's not.
translation.ko: 간단한 가로채기 낚아채기야 간단한 건 아니니까 그 단어는 빼고...
간단한 건 아니니까 그 단어는 빼고... - 낚아채기? - 낚아채기

translation.en: Minus the word snatch-and-grab because they mean the same thing.
The next building over, we use its sky cranes.
translation.ko: 우린 옆 건물에서 크레인을 쓸 거야

translation.en: One as a sniper's nest for yours truly,
and one as a crossover, building to building.
-Stay off the roof. -What do you mean leave the roof?
translation.ko: 크레인 고장으로 위험하니까 옥상 비워놓으세요 옥상을 비우라니? 처맞고 싶어?

translation.en: -Because I will fuck you up. -You not fuck me up.
translation.ko: 옥상을 비우라니? 처맞고 싶어? 누구 마음대로!

translation.en: We have 15 minutes before HK Police arrive.
-Good luck. -Saying good luck is bad luck.
translation.ko: 행운을 빌어 행운을 빌면 재수 없어

translation.en: -I take it back. -Taking it back is even worse luck.
translation.ko: 그럼 취소 취소하면 더 재수 없어

translation.en: Do you want me to die? Wanker.
Yeah, it's a good ride, One.
A little scary up here, but--
Yeah, I got the gun, smartass. Remember that.
Slow it down, One. Slow it down.
I got the target in his bed, scratching his balls, reading some Chinese book.
translation.ko: 타깃은 침대에서 불알 긁으며 책 본다

translation.en: Just kidding. I stole that from my old dentist's office.
translation.ko: 농담이야 옛날에 일하던 치과에서 웃음가스랑 같이 훔친 멘트야

translation.en: Along with a shit ton of nitrous.
translation.ko: 옛날에 일하던 치과에서 웃음가스랑 같이 훔친 멘트야

translation.en: Badges? We don't need no stinking badges.
What, am I funny to you?
How am I funny to you? Do I amuse you?
I'm gonna need your finger. Come here.
Two and Three, in the elevator.
One, he's gonna drown. I got four guys up top.
-You want me to drop 'em? -No, mission will be compromised.
Let me drop them, One. This is what I do.
And y'all can refer to me as Mr. Seven from now on.
Hot mask. In a Darth Vader daughter kind of way.
translation.ko: 마스크 섹시하네 다스 베이더 딸 같고

translation.en: Maybe later we can coochie-coochie? Stop it.
Oh, check this out. I went to the dentist.
You lost one of the seals.
You're on laughing gas, you dumb motherfucker.
translation.ko: 웃음가스 먹고 있네 이 등신 새끼

translation.en: I'm not giving you my gun.
Okay? Not just tonight, but ever.
It's a TV line, not a movie line.
-You almost done there? -Okay, we've got a problem.
Three got hit with nitrous, and he's stupider than usual.
translation.ko: 스리가 웃음가스 먹고 평소보다 더 멍청해졌어

translation.en: This is the funniest shit ever.
Anyone ever asked you dumb questions when you're 90 stories up?
Mate, you're really ruining my flow right now, you know that?
Just get those high-intensity speakers placed.
I got the targets all grouped in the kitchen.
Hey, have you ever been to an American movie theater?
No, I just pirate them on my phone.
That's an asshole move. All right.
Get ready to pull that trigger.
Get off. What are you doing?
Two, Three, you're clear to move up top.
Got the target. Moving out. Let's go.
This is like bringing a child to a gunfight.
There you go. Come on. Say peek-a-boo, you punk.

translation.ko: 누가 말 좀 해 내가 스리 죽인 거야?

translation.en: -Please tell me I did not just kill Three. -What the...
translation.ko: 누가 말 좀 해 내가 스리 죽인 거야? 무슨... 마스크 튼튼하네

translation.en: The hell are you picking up a bad guy's gun for, man?
translation.ko: 저 새끼들 총을 뭐 한다고 집어?

translation.en: -You shot me, brah! -This is going great.
-You don't look through a bullet hole. -I'm so mad at everyone right now.
translation.ko: 구멍을 들여다봐 - 진짜 열받아 죽을 거 같아 - 뭐 해?

translation.en: What's new? I like you mad.
I just got shot by my own man. More guys coming.
translation.ko: 한 팀한테 총 맞고 저놈들도 몰려오고

translation.en: What's going on? You have one minute left.
We're only supposed to have seven guys working.
Get up here now, all you've got.
Two at the bar, three in the corner.
Okay, we do like that movie Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid, okay?
They died at the end of that movie.
translation.ko: 그 영화 끝에 둘 다 죽잖아

translation.en: Two, Three, hold at the stair.
Half of China's in the lobby.
We're out of time. What the hell are you guys doing up there?
translation.ko: 시간 없어 뭐 하고 있는 거야?

translation.en: Negative. This place is full of police. Do not come down.
Only one way out. That's up.
Guys, I got a bad idea.
What do you mean you have a bad idea? You're supposed to have good ideas.
Like a really, really bad idea.
One, remember when I said some shit was gonna go bad?
translation.ko: 원, 일이 틀어지면 내가 어쩐다고 했지?

translation.en: Shoot people!You're a sniper, goddamn it!
Well, it's fucked up right now, so watch me work. I'm improvising.
Y'all might wanna grab a hold of some shit.
-What do you mean grab something? -The pool!
He almost killed us. I don't like Seven.
translation.ko: 다 죽을 뻔했네 세븐 마음에 안 들어

translation.en: -We need a long talk after this. -Yeah, we'll chat later.
translation.ko: 끝나고 나랑 얘기 좀 하자 그러자고

translation.en: You wanna tell everyone where you learned that shit?
-Is a helicopter coming to rescue us? -Yeah, pretty soon.
I mean, 'cause... Oh, no, no, no. Come on. What? Wait.
Oh, my God. I'm afraid of heights. I will have a heart attack.
-Stop! Goddamn it! -What kind of bullshit is this?
I thought you guys are here to rescue me.
-What's wrong with you, you fucking goon? -I was trying to knock him out.
No. He's the whole point of the mission.

translation.ko: 구출이 목적이잖아 머리를 좀 써 - 안 간다잖아 - 됐어, 가!
- 안 돼, 저리 가요 - 이리 와!

translation.en: -What the fuck is wrong with you? -He was escaping.
And why do he think he might wanna get away from you?
translation.ko: 왜 너 피해서 도망치는 거 같은데?

translation.en: You should thank me. I just saved the mission.
translation.ko: 고마운 줄 알아 내 덕에 임무 성공했어

translation.en: What? Then get off of him.
How many times do I have to save this mission? Fuck.
-Probably have ice in the car. Whatever. -Fucking sick prick. I'm so sorry.
translation.ko: - 차에 가면 얼음 있겠지 - 저 미친놈, 정말 미안해요

translation.en: Don't help. Don't help. Just stay right there, James Bond. Thank you.
translation.ko: 도와주지 말고 가만있어 제임스 본드, 고마워

translation.en: What made your president change his mind?
This wasn't him. The guy doesn't know how to spell Turgistan.
translation.ko: 그 인간 지시 아니에요 투르기스탄 철자도 모를걸요

translation.en: This better not be what I'm thinking it is.

translation.ko: 뭔데요? 쿠데타로 형 대신 날 앉히는 일
쿠데타로 형 대신 날 앉히는 일

translation.en: -What is that? -Three blew the budget on the Ferrari.
translation.ko: - 저건 뭐야? - 스리가 페라리 날려 먹었어

translation.en: It's adorable. We are not having a good night.
I can't steer like Six, so let's avoid any violent bullshit, all right?
translation.ko: 난 식스처럼 못 몰아 조용히 가자고

translation.en: Oh, shit! Was that a bad guy?

translation.ko: 경찰 아저씨 나 납치됐어요! - 죽여버릴 거야 - 이번엔 놔둘게

translation.en: -And I'm gonna let you. -They are kidnapping me!
translation.ko: - 죽여버릴 거야 - 이번엔 놔둘게 납치당한 거예요!

translation.en: Hey, cops, where are you going?
Fuck. I made it across. Southwest side.
-Stop the car. -No, don't stop the car.
translation.ko: - 차 세워 - 안 돼, 세우지 마

translation.en: -Stop the car. -Do not stop the car.
-Stop the fucking car! -Hey! Don't fucking do it!
I'm not doing this again. I'm not leaving him behind.
translation.ko: 또 이렇겐 못 해 난 버리고 못 가

translation.en: -Get out of the car. -He's in the net up there.
My most loyal generals are dead, and my brother is loose.
And women. Uncommonly skilled in covering their tracks.
Outside of their violence against you, they appear not to exist at all.
You mean to tell me, in a world of cell phones and internet browsers--
We have found no digital footprints.
She was declared dead seven months ago.
I find people by examining their links to the world,
Once I find a thread, I pull it and keep pulling it until I reach them,
translation.ko: 실오라기 하나를 찾아내면 계속 당겨서 실체를 찾고 우리 암살팀을 보내요

translation.en: so I can have my teams kill them.
translation.ko: 계속 당겨서 실체를 찾고 우리 암살팀을 보내요

translation.en: Whatever links to the world these people had, they've cut them.
And yet they walk the earth like you and me.
They have blood types and birthdays and sock drawers.
This ghost act is itself a form of hubris.
If they exist, they can be made not to.
This shit isn't sitting right with me. You made me a promise.
You said you'd always let me pull the trigger.
You know why we don't use names?
No offense, Four, I'm glad you're alive, but you left us out on that street there.
translation.ko: 포가 살아서 다행이지만 네가 저격하는 동안 우리가 노출됐었어

translation.en: If I was up there, I'd expect you to leave me and not turn back.
translation.ko: 내가 위에 있었어도 날 버리고 가야 돼

translation.en: -No. Fuck that. -Mission is more important than the man.
-You don't leave a soldier behind. -I got news for you.
translation.ko: 전우를 버리고 가진 않아 이참에 말해주는데 넌 이제 군인 아니야

translation.en: Seven, you're not a soldier anymore. She's not a doctor.
translation.ko: 이참에 말해주는데 넌 이제 군인 아니야 의사도 스파이도

translation.en: -He's not a hit man. And I'm not a CEO. -A rich asshole?
translation.ko: - 킬러도 CEO도 아니야 - 그냥 재수 없는 부자?

translation.en: Oh, I am still a rich asshole. I just don't have a name.
translation.ko: - 재수 없는 부자는 맞아 - 그렇지 이름만 없을 뿐이지

translation.en: I'm Blaine. I just saved your life.
Billy. -You look like a Billy. -You look like a Four.
It's nice to meet everyone. That's great.
translation.ko: 다들 반가워 아주 좋네 됐으니까 가자

translation.en: That's great. Let's go. Let's go.
Hey, ghosts. This is Seven, AKA Blaine.
We're below radar, and we're entering Turgistan airspace.
That gives us four days till Day of the Dead.
Concentric circles. Your enemy's radius of operations is shrinking.
Thirty-eight hours ago, an unidentified aircraft vanished off radar near Tyrus.
translation.ko: 38시간 전 미확인 항공기가 타이루스 쪽에서 사라졌어요

translation.en: It filed no flight plan. It ignored control and then disappeared.
translation.ko: 비행 계획도 없었고 교신도 끊고 사라졌죠

translation.en: It's a two-block walk. Come on.
Funny guy. What is your number?
One, two, three? Whatever it is. My number is zero.
translation.ko: 원, 투, 스리? 내 숫자는 제로예요 여기서 놀고 있으니까
내 숫자는 제로예요 여기서 놀고 있으니까

translation.en: Actually, you got the biggest job of all, buddy.
None of this matters if you don't step up.
They will catch all of us.
one opportunity to seize everything that you ever wanted
translation.ko: 원하던 모든 걸 잡을 기회가 있다면

translation.en: in one moment, would you capture it or let it slip?
If I do whatever you're asking me to do, my brother will cut off my head.
translation.ko: 당신 말대로 했다간 형이 날 참수할 거예요

translation.en: And he loves cutting heads. And believe me,
compared to what he will do with you ghosts, this is nothing.
translation.ko: 그래도 당신들이 당할 짓에 비하면 아무것도 아니에요

translation.en: I wonder how many people you have to kill to get one of these.
translation.ko: 몇 명 죽이면 이런 거 세워줄까?

translation.en: Three little words have helped dictators rule:
translation.ko: 이 네 글자는 독재 정권의 가장 큰 아군이죠

translation.en: We're gonna become the new heads of programming...
...and you're gonna be our new spokesperson.
After his national address, he'll have a big party on his yacht.
translation.ko: 형은 담화문을 내고 요트에서 파티할 거예요

translation.en: If we're gonna flush Rovach to his yacht, we need to disable security at his palace,
translation.ko: 로바흐를 요트로 보내려면 궁전의 보안을 무력화해야 해

translation.en: which means a crippling surge of electricity,
which means an unannounced visit to a state-run power generator.
This one's highly defended, no back doors, so we walk through the front.
translation.ko: 뒷문도 없고 삼엄하니까 정문으로 가야 돼

translation.en: All right, guys. You're clear to the gate.
Never underestimate the power of a very nice suit.
translation.ko: 명품 슈트의 힘을 과소평가하지 말 것

translation.en: Everything's looking good. They're in. Cheeks on seats.
Manchester. Manchester and Farquarson. We've got a website, look it up.
Inspection is our business. That's the slogan.
My name is Mr. Worthington, and this is my associate, mister...
Got a bit of booze in there?
-Cup. Compliment his wife. -Is that your wife?
It's hard living out here, isn't it?
Did she come out full grown?
Faked me out there with the gray hair and the wrinkles.
-And the orthopedic shoes. -What do you want?
Plants three through seven, they passed.
translation.ko: 발전소 일곱 곳 중 세 곳이 통과했죠

translation.en: I have no doubt that you will too, all right?
The only failure was at plant two. You know, that was very...
...minor. Yes. So, you know Mr. Noor?
-We're trying to keep his name out of it. -Yeah.
-Noor is dead. Say he's dead. -No, he's dead.
Yeah. He was found with a belt...
tied around his neck in an unfortunate masturbating accident.
translation.ko: 목에 감겨 있었는데 자위 중에 변을 당했어요

translation.en: Come on. We've all choked ourselves having a little choke, haven't we?
And this is our finest room.
It transmits all state-run television and power to the palace.
Maybe Mr. Graves can mention it to Mr. Bashir?
Does it ever bother you, bro?
Like, one wrong word in there, and they go find themselves an eight?
translation.ko: 저기서 한 마디만 잘못해도 에이트, 나인을 찾겠지?

translation.en: Why do think I chose you?
translation.ko: 내가 왜 널 골랐을 거 같아?

translation.en: A man whose longest relationship's with a rifle.
You don't know my fucking life, bro.
You can't do the stuff that we do and have someone you love.
translation.ko: 사랑하는 사람이 있으면 우리 일을 못 해

translation.en: Everybody's got someone or something to lose, man.
translation.ko: 누구나 잃기 싫은 뭔가가 있는 거야

translation.en: No, I'm gonna leave this world same way that I came into it.
translation.ko: 아니, 난... 난 태어날 때처럼 떠날 생각이야

translation.en: You can drop the boo-hoo bullshit 'cause I see through it.
You've got a soul, man. You should let it out.
Presidente, we go live in five minutes.
presidential protocol is they take him to his yacht.
They store him in a stateroom. It's hardened like a bunker.
translation.ko: 벙커 같은 대통령실에 머물게 돼 있지

translation.en: It's not the length of the boat...
The route to Rovach's boat will take about an hour.
You know, none of us will be remembered.
Little things, they add up to big things.
translation.ko: 작은 일들이 모여 큰일이 되는 거지

translation.en: Hey, One. I'm freaking the fuck out.
No, I can't do this. I can't go live.
translation.ko: 이건 안 돼요, 생방은 안 돼

translation.en: For so many years, our people have suffered under my brother.
translation.ko: 국민들은 오랜 세월 제 형에게 핍박받았습니다

translation.en: Free yourself, rise up. Set us free.
Rise up and let's take our country back.
Just tell me. Who the fuck is it?
State TV are compromised. It's showing everywhere.
Every man we've got, fully armed and tacked.
All right, guys, here they come.
I'm counting cars. It's like a fucking parade.
Bring in strike fighters to escort me.
Replace traditional ordinance with sarin VX.
Why is it always me that has to do this kind of shit, man?
translation.ko: 왜 꼭 이딴 일은 나한테 시켜?

translation.en: Hey, Chatty Cathy. Do you know what over and out means?
I'm just saying I'm a little afraid. What do you want me to say?
There's a lot of bad guys, and I'm the only good guy here. Move!
translation.ko: 나쁜 놈 천지고 착한 놈은 나 하나야 비켜! 비켜!

translation.en: If I die, just tell my mother that I love her.
They poke the nest, they're gonna find hornets.
Oh, okay, papi. They have fighter jets. They have fighter jets, man.
Ceramic barrels, plastic frames, plastic mags.
These are no longer my people.
This is where you ask me if I'm afraid.
I'm good. Just making the world a better place, that's all.
Hey, Four, you've gotta sabotage that anchor.
See you on the other side.
Open the bridge. All the way.
Don't start the party without me.
Time clock. Guys. Let's go. Go.
I told the captain to move. There's nothing more I can do.
translation.ko: 선장에게 말했어요 그 이상 뭘 어째요?

translation.en: I want to move right now!
Start the engines. Prepare to leave.
Everyone, strap on body armor, and tell the captain let's get going.
translation.ko: 전원 방탄조끼 입고 선장에게 출발하라고 해

translation.en: Captain of the Kismet. I need military escort.
Not so fast. We're gonna stay and party. Get down.
translation.ko: 서두르지 마 파티 시작해야지 무릎 꿇어 무릎 꿇으라고

translation.en: Down. Get down. On your knees.
-All right. -Show me your hands, por favor.
translation.ko: 알았어요 손 이리 내, 양손 다!

translation.en: This is Turgistan security on the Kismet. Pirates have just--
We must target him not where he's strong but where he's weak.
Hospitals, to take away his safety.
Schools, to take away his future.
-Commence gas attack. -Get out of my way.
So you don't have to kill your own people again.
Tell the military to back away from that boat.
Together, we will bring peace to our beloved country.
translation.ko: 함께 우리 조국에 평화를 되찾는 겁니다

translation.en: And we've got the fancy composite Kevlar. I hope this works, man.
translation.ko: 우리도 끝내주는 케블라 조끼 있어 - 통해야 할 텐데 - 통할 거야

translation.en: -It'll work. -They have some fancy food up there, huh?
Really? Tell me more about that. Don't hold back.
It's so delicious, man. They put this little cheese on it.
Does it have to be on the walkie-talkie? And we're all standing right here. Yeah?
translation.ko: 그걸 교신기로 얘기해야 돼? 우리 다 여기 있잖아

translation.en: -Don't you give me attitude, okay? -Over and out.
translation.ko: - 까칠하게 굴지 좀 마 - 교신 오버

translation.en: Don't scratch my boat with your guns. It cost me one billion manat.
You're untouchable now. This is the safest ship on the seas.
translation.ko: 이제 안심하세요 세상에서 가장 안전한 배니까

translation.en: It's a panic room with deck chairs.
All right. When I pop this, the magnet pulse lasts for 15 seconds.
translation.ko: 이걸 누르면 자기 펄스가 15초간 지속될 거야

translation.en: Welcome to the world's biggest magnet.
translation.ko: 세계 최대의 자석에 오신 걸 환영합니다

translation.en: I was thinking that when this is over, I want you to meet my mother, yes?
translation.ko: 이거 다 끝나면 우리 엄마 만나볼래?

translation.en: Oh, God. You didn't say that.
I found the back doors to Rovach's suite.
I can't just fix it, all right? The phone is very fucking complicated.
translation.ko: 그냥 못 고쳐 휴대폰이 복잡하단 말이야

translation.en: -Sir, please, we must leave right now. -Hungry. I went for a dip.
I just went for a dip, all right? This is succulent chicken, man.

translation.ko: - 손 들어 - 쿠스쿠스 한 입 줘?

translation.en: I would love to meet your mother.
-What the fuck? -Put the phone down, and use your gun.
Holy shit! I mean, I wasn't sure it would work.
I mean, I wasn't "sure" sure. I had a suspicion, but I...
God, this is all so fucking dangerous.
Hey. You like that phone now, motherfucker?
translation.ko: 야, 이제 이 폰의 위력을 알겠냐?

translation.en: Stop fucking around. We gotta find Rovach.
This ship's some sort of magnet.
Jesus. What did you do? You goddamn animals.
translation.ko: 뭔 짓을 한 거야? 짐승도 아니고

translation.en: Don't look at me. She's the evil one.
translation.ko: 나 쳐다보지 마 저 여자가 그랬어

translation.en: -they're gonna pull them from the boat. -You're sick.
translation.ko: 빨리 안 가면 요트에서 도망칠 거야 미쳤어

translation.en: -Magnet! Where is the magnet? -They're getting their guns!
Shit. They got our position. We need to move.
Honestly, I didn't think we'd make it this far.
Five, find Rovach. I'll distract the guards.
I've got four guys on me. I'm on the upper deck, and I'm screwed.
Oh, no.Wait, wait. I got it.
I almost shot you right in the head, man.
Goddamn it. You go eat some food.
Get me to the rescue boat.
One. Rovach is leaving with a guard.
What do you want me to do?
Get me out of this boat.
What's your 20? Anybody got eyes on the target?
I don't know my 20. Stay off the channel. I'm going for Four.
translation.ko: 어딘지 모르겠어 다들 조용히 해봐 포 찾고 있어 포, 어디야?

translation.en: -Four, where you at, buddy? -You're breaking your own rules.
translation.ko: 포 찾고 있어 포, 어디야? 네 규칙을 네가 어겨?

translation.en: I thought you didn't have a family.
It's a big ship. Say something, pal.
One, you gotta get here fast.
It's a TV show. Come on, let's go.
As fast as you can fly to the villa in Dezar.
translation.ko: 데자르에 있는 빌라로 최대한 빨리 가

translation.en: I was thinking of somewhere else.
In Turgistan, we're witnessing a regime change.
-We're following a major breaking story. -The country's been overthrown...
We understand countries around the world are now mobilizing to give them help.
Refugee camps are emptying. It's an amazing sight to see.
We're following a major breaking story.
We understand now that they're dropping Rovach off to rebels.
You didn't listen to me, brother.
I have no idea what happens when you die.
Oh, we can do some shit...
They say that your soul departs when you pass.
Well, for us, it was the opposite.
I am one... but not done.
Next time, can we just knock off a fucking casino?
